mobile.name: spider young
mobile.long_description: The young spider is ballooning by you.
mobile.description: He looks freshly hatched and sprightly. His young fangs are just growing in as of late.

mobile.name: yevaud dragon usurper
mobile.long_description: Yevaud, the Usurper of Midgaard is here, grinning evilly at you.
mobile.description: Old, scaly, but still with a lot of bite in him left.

mobile.name: spider wolf
mobile.long_description: The wolf spider is here, licking its bloody fangs.
mobile.description: The wolf spider is hairy, very hairy.

mobile.name: orc
mobile.long_description: The orc is stuck in the web and he can't get out.
mobile.description: You notice an evil look in his eyes, but he seems quite drained of life, and all he can do is glare at you while he's stuck in this web.

mobile.name: wasp queen
mobile.long_description: The queen wasp is here, thinking how tasty you look.
mobile.description: You notice a glazed look in her eyes.

mobile.name: spider drone
mobile.long_description: A drone spider walks around doing its master's bidding.

mobile.name: spider ethereal
mobile.long_description: An ethereal spider strides here, traveling to different worlds.
mobile.description: She winks in and out of reality. It looks like it'd be difficult to hit her without a magical weapon.

mobile.name: slave human
mobile.long_description: A human slave of Arachnos works here relentlessly.
mobile.description: The slave does not mind you, but will fight like a warrior if attacked. He serves the spider Empress, Arachnos, though whether it is by choice or because he was beguiled, you are not fully certain.

mobile.name: quasit
mobile.long_description: A quasit blinks in and out, grinning at you.
mobile.description: Demoniac in nature, but more mischievous. He twiddles his thumbs and creates a magical treasure!

mobile.name: spider bird
mobile.long_description: The bird spider snaps its powerful jaws.
mobile.description: The Bird Spider has very powerful jaws.

mobile.name: hermit
mobile.long_description: The hermit sits here and warns, 'Go back before it is too late!'
mobile.description: A dishevelled veteran warrior in disguise is what he is, but he means well.

mobile.name: donjonkeeper keeper
mobile.long_description: The Donjonkeeper eyes you and wonders how pure your soul is.
mobile.description: He delves deeper into you as you stare at him. Only those free of taint will be allowed to remain here safely.

mobile.name: guardian
mobile.long_description: The guardian is obviously not doing his job.
mobile.description: He looks like a lazy bum who sleeps half the time.

mobile.name: arachnos spider empress
mobile.long_description: Arachnos the Empress of Spiders welcomes you with an evil smile.
mobile.description: She is a very attractive spider with an ornate gown. She tempts you into being one of her many slaves. She does not possess the venomous fangs of normal spiders, but then, as you realize, she does not need them.

mobile.name: ki-rin
mobile.long_description: The Ki-Rin smiles good-naturedly to you.
mobile.description: She is the last bastion of good in this realm. Her mission is to someday free the slaves of the Empress. She has been trapped here for time eternal, and now the evil power of Arachnos feeds upon her intense magical energies. She will never give up here fight against evil, though, and will continue her work in whatever manner presents itself.

mobile.name: dragon wormkin young
mobile.long_description: A wormkin with no teeth plays here.
mobile.description: It is a rather small dragon, and you almost feel sad about killing it.

mobile.name: dragon wormkin elder
mobile.long_description: A wormkin that has grown a bit stares at you inquisitively.
mobile.description: A medium-sized dragon -- seems it hasn't killed anything yet by itself, though there is a first time for everything...
